actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Development Association.

summary.text: Amends the International Development Association Act to authorize the United States Governor of the Association to make the United States contribution to the Fifth Replenishment of the Resources of the Association. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary for such contribution.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the International Development Association.
